sourcesContent:
<template>
  <form class="form" id="task-form">
    <input
      type="text"
      class="input"
      placeholder="Введите название"
      id="task-input"
      required
      :v-model="taskName"
    />
    <button @click="onSubmit" type="button" class="form__btn">Добавить</button>
    <button @click="closeForm" type="button" class="form__btn">Отмена</button>
  </form>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  name: "AddTaskForm",
  props: {
    taskName: {
      type: String,
      required: true,
    },
  },
  methods: {
    onSubmit() {
      console.log("efedsfwe");
      console.log(this.taskName);
      this.$emit("submit");
    },
    closeForm() {
      this.$emit("cancel");
    },
  },
  setup() {},
};
</script>

<style scoped></style>
